rows.label: qst702005_msg0001
rows.name: Hey... It's you guys from before!

rows.label: qst702005_msg0002
rows.name:
We were chased by some Tirkins
and ran all the way here...

rows.label: qst702005_msg0003
rows.name:
I'm glad we found you. We
were looking for you.

rows.label: qst702005_msg0004
rows.name: Kei and I talked about it.

rows.label: qst702005_msg0005
rows.name:
Dad isn't coming for us, and
it's hard for just the two of
us to live in the camp...

rows.label: qst702005_msg0006
rows.name:
We decided that if we saw
you again, we'd ask you
to take us to Superbia.

rows.label: qst702005_msg0007
rows.name:
If we left a letter at the
camp or in Torigo, Dad would
probably find it...

rows.label: qst702005_msg0008
rows.name:
Well... he might be dead and unable
to come looking for us, though...

rows.label: qst702005_msg0009
rows.name:
Hey, why are you smiling?
I'm being serious here!

rows.label: qst702005_msg0010
rows.name: You want me to just follow you?
